description: This file defines traits for various metrics logging interfaces, including basic metrics, state metrics, and browser-specific metrics, with methods for enabling/disabling logging, tracking state transitions, page loads, URL changes, visibility, and page closures.

methods.name: enable
methods.description: Enables metrics logging, returning Ok or Err.

methods.name: disable
methods.description: Disables metrics logging, returning Ok or Err.

methods.name: is_enabled
methods.description: Checks if metrics logging is enabled.

methods.name: log_counter
methods.description: Logs a counter metric with a name and value.

methods.name: log_gauge
methods.description: Logs a gauge metric with a name and value.

methods.name: log_timing
methods.description: Logs a timing metric with a name and duration.

methods.name: resumed
methods.description: Logs a transition to resumed state.

methods.name: suspended
methods.description: Logs a transition to suspended state.

methods.name: load_finished
methods.description: Logs completion of a page load with URL, status, success, and totals.

methods.name: url_change
methods.description: Logs a URL change with the new URL and load status.

methods.name: visibility_change
methods.description: Logs a change in page visibility.

methods.name: page_closure
methods.description: Logs the closure of a page.
